class.name: velocity_controllers/JointTrajectoryController
class.description: The JointTrajectoryController executes joint-space trajectories on a set of joints. This variant represents trajectory segments as quintic splines and sends commands to a velocity interface.

class.name: ur_controllers/PosVelAccForwardController
class.description: Forwards Position/Velocity/Acceleration command vectors through to the UR controller.

class.name: ur_controllers/VelocityForwardController
class.description: Forwards velocity command vectors through to the UR controller.

class.name: ur_controllers/ConfigForwardController
class.description: Forwards config commands through to the UR controller.

class.name: ur_controllers/PosVelAccModeController
class.description: Changes the control mode to Position/Velocity/Acceleration commands.

class.name: ur_controllers/VelocityModeController
class.description: Changes the control mode to Position/Velocity/Acceleration commands.

class.name: ur_controllers/DiagnosticPublishController
class.description: Publishes the UR mode states as diagnostics messages.
